IonicSecurity::SDK::DeviceProfilePersistorDefault Class Reference

Device profile persistor class that chooses an appropriate storage for the platform. For Windows, it stores in a Windows DP API encrypted file. More...

Detailed Description

Device profile persistor class that chooses an appropriate storage for the platform. For Windows, it stores in a Windows DP API encrypted file.

See also
DeviceProfilePersistorWindows
